arts.ttl: Espanyol star warns Real Madrid – ‘Our confidence is sky high, that makes us dangerous’
arts.sum: Real Madrid take on RCD Espanyol in Matchweek 5 of the 2025/26 La Liga season at the Santiago Bernabeu on Saturday. The Merengues have maintained a 100% record so far this season, winning five in five across all competitions, and will be gunning for their sixth win tomorrow. arts.ttl: Real Madrid vs Espanyol : Predicted Lineup for La Liga Clash
arts.sum: The injuries to Trent Alexander-Arnold and Antonio Rudiger, and now the suspension of Dean Huijsen, mean there is a mini crisis when it comes to defensive players available. Real Madrid take on Espanyol on September 20, with head coach Xabi Alonso facing some significant questions regarding his starting XI selection.

arts.sum: The club captain, Javi Puado, was asked about the current season and their upcoming game against Real Madrid after a training session. In a press conference after a training session (h/t Marca ), Javi Puado spoke about Real Madrid, the team they face in La Liga next.

arts.sum: Real Madrid welcomed Jude Bellingham and Eduardo Camavinga back into the squad for the first time this season when they faced Olympique de Marseille. Indeed, the midfield duo received their medical discharge earlier this week and were named in the squad for the game on Tuesday.
